channel.title: Help ;\
channel.description: okay I have been coding on windows xp and i get this new computer and is vista never had vista before so im not the best at it anyways, When I run client/server/complier i get Java not recgnized error or not having jdk error. I have jdk and java idk whats wrong somone help vista is so much different :confused:

item.title: Help ;\
item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

my run.bat doesnt have all that its just @echo off title Karahan's client cd Source java -Xmx1000m -cp .; Class51 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause/code]

And when i had Xp it worked fine like that

Read full topic

item.title: Help ;\
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

the run file is most likely a batch script (run.bat). open up that file in Notepad (or any other text editor), and search for “jdk” within the document. most likely, the run.bat file cannot find your jdk, even though it’s installed; change the entire path ("C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6/bin or something like that) to the correct one.

if it still doesn’t work, make sure you have the newest version of Java installed.

Read full topic
